Packages that use Pool
eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.api.core Contains the API core classes and interfaces which are somewhat independent.

eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.block Block implementations used by the Flow Engine and runtime. 
eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.block.db   
eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.comm Communication classes through various means: JDBC, JMS, SOAP, FTP, HTTP, etc.
